channel.title: How do I make a ::master command? :D [562]
channel.description: title says it all, where would I put it, and what would the code be? this is for 562 btw.

item.title: How do I make a ::master command? :D [562]
item.dc:creator: @gnomez gnomez
item.description:
@gnomez wrote:

you would put it in CommandPacketHandler

		} else if(cmd[0].equals("master")) {
			if(cmd.length == 1) {
				for(int i = 0; i < Skills.SKILL_COUNT; i++) {
					player.getSkills().addXp(i, 200000000);
				}
			} else {
				player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Syntax is ::master [id=all].");
			}

code would be something like that you would put it under any other code you have

you can fix it up and tidy it urself its a bit messy but it should work and sorry for spoonfeeding

edit:
you can also just use if you dont need a else

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make a ::master command? :D [562]
